TextEng: "Is this some form of trick?"
"How is it that a sword can talk?"
"Err... who are you?"
"And you seek to escape now?"
"Stuck? Stuck how?"
"What's the catch?"
"I might be interested... what do you do, exactly?"
"Amongst other things?"
"I have no need of a longsword, sorry."
"I don't trust you. You'll remain where you are."
Text: "널 믿을 수 없어. 거기 그대로 있어."

TextEng: "Perhaps remaining a longsword would be best."
Text: "장검으로 남는 게 제일 나을 것 같은데."

TextEng: "I suppose I could use a powerful greatsword..."
Text: "강력한 대검은 쓸 수 있을 것 같은데..."

TextEng: "I suppose I could use a powerful short sword..."
Text: "강력한 소검은 쓸 수 있을 것 같은데..."

TextEng: "I suppose I could use a powerful dagger..."
Text: "강력한 단검은 쓸 수 있을 것 같은데..."

TextEng: "Forget it. You'll stay right here."
"I shall take you, if I can." <StartAction>[Take the sword.]</Start>
"Perhaps if you became a greatsword, instead..."
"Perhaps if you became a longsword, instead..."
"Perhaps if you became a short sword, instead..."
"Perhaps if you became a dagger, instead..."
"I've heard tales about intelligent weapons taking over their users..."
Text: "지능을 가진 무기가 사용자를 장악한다는 이야기를 들었는데..."

TextEng: "And what were you in life, Enserric?"
"How long ago did this happen?"
"Where is your body? I don't see it anywhere."
"How is that a long story?"
